entry.dcterms:title: TÁRKI Book 2002. The book buying habits of Hungarian secondary school students.
entry.dcterms:creator: Zsadányi-Nagy, Csaba
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-F29: TÁRKI Book 2002. The book buying habits of Hungarian secondary school students.. data sheet. Version: 2007-01-19
entry.dcterms:creator: Kolosi, Tamás
entry.dcterms:contributor: Association of Hungarian Publishers and Distributors
entry.dcterms:description: reading culture and book purchase habits of secondary school students
entry.dcterms:subject: social behaviour and attitudes
society and culture
consumption/consumer behavior
public services
survey data
cross-section

A two-stage probability sample of 14-20-year old students. In the first round 20 secondary schools were randomly selected, in the second stage all the students of two randomly selected classes from each school were interviewed.
self-administered questionnaire
A
